column1:
[CA(PHC)  APN 
In  Ranil  Charuka  Kulatunga  v.  Attorney  General

“  the  quantity  of  cocaine 
involved  in  this  case  is  62.847

grams,  which 
is  a  commercial  quantity. 
If  Petitioner 
is

convicted, 
the  punishment 
is  death  or 
life 
imprisonment.
Under these circumstances, it is prudent to conclude the trial
early while the petitioner is kept in custody.”
